thread.section_title: New World Beijing Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Hidden Gem!
thread.title_full: Hidden Gem! - Review of New World Beijing Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: dr_koala
title: Hidden Gem!
text: I love this hotel in Beijing! The prices are reasonable, it's close to many major attractions, and the staff is amazing. Not to mention it is modern and spacious. It was my birthday and they upgraded me and sent a cake! They make you feel at home and give you a wonderful experience in Beijing. Highly recommended.
